mapper.select: SELECT B.BARNO, B.BARNAME, B.USERID, B.PROFILENO, B.LOCATIONNO, B.BARINFO, B.MANAGER, B.CONTACT, B.BARADDRESS, B.GENRENO, P.PATH, P.ORIGINNAME, P.STOREDNAME FROM BAR B LEFT OUTER JOIN PROFILEPIC P ON B.PROFILENO = P.PROFILENO ORDER BY BARNO

SELECT B.BARNO, B.BARNAME, B.USERID, B.PROFILENO, B.LOCATIONNO, B.BARINFO, B.MANAGER, B.CONTACT, B.BARADDRESS, B.GENRENO, P.PATH, P.ORIGINNAME, P.STOREDNAME, L.LOCATIONNAME, G.GENRENAME FROM BAR B, PROFILEPIC P, LOCATION L, GENRE G WHERE B.PROFILENO = P.PROFILENO AND B.GENRENO = G.GENRENO AND B.LOCATIONNO = L.LOCATIONNO ORDER BY BARNO
